* Steve Bjorg <steveb@...> [2009-01-11 22:45]:
> On Jan 11, 2009, at 1:33 PM, Aristotle Pagaltzis wrote:
> > My suggestion was
> >
> >    example.org/en/somedoc
> >
> > which is easier to hack and in some web frameworks also
> > easier to dispatch (because the language is in a fixed place
> > in the URI).
>
> I like this URI structure, but doing so because of "some" web
> frameworks is about the worst reason imaginable.

It’s bad as a reason but nice as a bonus.

Regards,
-- 
Aristotle Pagaltzis // <http://plasmasturm.org/>
